title: Draftsman in Civil Engineering from ITI or equivalent qualifications with five years experience under Architect / Engineer
clause_text: Draftsman in Civil Engineering from ITI or equivalent qualifications with five years experience under Architect / Engineer. For Supervisor - 1 : He shall be entitled to submit - All plans and related information connected with development permission on plot up to 500 sq.m.; and Certificate of supervision of buildings on plot up to 500 Sq.m. and completion thereof. All Plans and related information up to 200 sq.m. built up area, and Certificate of supervision for limits at (i) above and completion thereof.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Draftsman in Civil Engineering from ITI or equivalent qualifications with five years experience under Architect / Engineer.
